fixed_skill.desc: Increase party's Attack by 10.9%/11.4%/12.0%. For every 500 of the user's Attack, increase party's Attack by 0.9%/0.9%/1.0% more, up to 7.2%/7.6%/7.9%. Lasts for 3 turns.
fixed_skill.name: Matarukaja

innate_skill.desc: Deal Ice damage to 1 foe equal to 121.7/127.8/133.9% of Attack. 67.6/71.0/74.4% chance to inflict Freeze for 2 turns.
innate_skill.name: Bufudyne

innate_skill.desc: Increase Speed by 12. Decrease Defense by 8%.
innate_skill.name: Agility Master III

passive_skill.desc: Increase ailment accuracy by 21.2%. Whenever using a buff skill, permanently increase party's Attack by 6.7%. Stacks up to 3 times.
passive_skill.name: Beloved Princess

passive_skill.desc: Increase ailment accuracy by 21.2%. Whenever using a buff skill, permanently increase party's Attack by 7.6%. Stacks up to 3 times.
passive_skill.name: Beloved Princess I

passive_skill.desc: Increase ailment accuracy by 21.2%. Whenever using a buff skill, permanently increase party's Attack by 8.5%. Stacks up to 3 times.
passive_skill.name: Beloved Princess II

showtime_skill.desc: Increase party's damage by 29.5%/31.6%/33.6% for 2 turns.
showtime_skill.name: Highlight
